column1: Dramborleg was the great axe that Tuor favoured over any sword.
Tuor fought with it in the Fall of Gondolin
column2: slaying three balrogs and Othrod among others.
column3: p. 181  He took it when he escaped the downfall of that city
column4: and his descendants took it to Númenor as an heirloom.  It did not survive the Downfall of Númenor.

column1: Dramborleg means Thudder-Sharp in the language of the Gondolindrim.
